# Logarithm
<!-- This file was generated - DO NOT CHANGE IT MANUALLY -->



Transforms all numbers by applying the logarithm function. Non-numeric values are left unchanged.


## Parameter

### Base

No description

- ID: `base`
- Datatype: `int`
- Default Value: `10`





## Advanced Parameter

`None`
